description: This file declares internal functions for the Slap Sco Buffer Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP). It contains function prototypes related to buffer size retrieval and data access, and includes licensing and module information.

methods.name: SlapScoBufGetSize
methods.description: Function prototype for retrieving the size of the buffer.

methods.name: SlapScoBufGetData
methods.description: Function prototype for accessing the buffer data as an unsigned char array.
